channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ohio State University is requiring every student to use AI in class to become ‘AI fluent’
item.description: The university's "AI Fluency" initiative aims to ensure all students graduate equipped to apply AI tools and applications in their fields.

item.title: Can AI be used to control safety critical systems? A U.K.-funded research program aims to find out
item.description: The U.K.'s ARIA wants to create a 'production facility' where AI will design and test new control algorithms for power grids, biopharmaceutical manufa...

item.title: LA Protests Give Karen Bass a Second Chance to Lead Her City Through a Crisis

item.title: At Least 9 Dead After Austria School Shooting, Police Say

item.title: Brooks Running’s CEO shares the best piece of leadership advice he got from Warren Buffett’s Berskhire Hathaway
item.description: The ability to see past your biases is critical.

item.title: Young Israeli Hostage Says Finding Faith Helped Him Survive Hamas Captivity
item.description: How Omer Shem Tov, who was 20 years old and not particularly religious when taken hostage, survived 505 days in captivity.

item.title: Graz, Austria, School Shooting: What to Know

item.title: Slashing public health funding is a national security disaster in the making: Howard Dean
item.description: Defense officials have long warned that pandemics, bioterrorism, and emerging infections are critical threats to U.S. stability.

item.title: Why drinking sugar may be worse than eating it
item.description: “This is the first study to draw clear dose-response relationships between different sugar sources and type 2 diabetes risk,” said researchers.

item.title: Pressure Rises on Israel as U.K., Canada and Others Impose Sanctions on 2 Far-Right Ministers
item.description: The coordinated move highlights the hardening of several countries’ stance toward Israel amid the dire humanitarian crisis in Gaza.
